key_findings.executive_summary: Complete FastAPI authentication system implemented with Cognito JWT validation, token refresh, caching, and async compatibility

critical_data.jwt_validation: CognitoJWTValidator with JWKS client, token validation, claims extraction, and user roles parsing
critical_data.token_refresh: CognitoTokenRefresher with refresh token exchange, expiration checking, and automatic token renewal
critical_data.authentication_strategy: FastAPIAuthenticationStrategy with JWT validation integration and IAM provider usage
critical_data.caching_system: RequestScopedAuthCache and UserContextCache with thread-safe operations and TTL support
critical_data.error_handling: Comprehensive authentication error handling with structured logging
critical_data.async_compatibility: All authentication operations are async-compatible with proper AnyIO patterns

metrics.test_coverage: Async auth flow and performance tests passing

cross_session_notes: Complete authentication system with Cognito JWT validation is functional
Async authentication flow tested and validated with AnyIO patterns
Performance tests confirm <200ms response time requirements met
Thread-safe caching system implemented for authentication data
Authentication middleware ready for per-context integration
Behavior-focused tests implemented following testing principles
